derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English (denoting any of various plants supposed to cure madness), from Old French ellebre, elebore or medieval Latin eleborus, via Latin from Greek helleboros

means.word_mean: 1. perennial herbs of the lily family having thick toxic rhizomes
2. any plant of the Eurasian genus Helleborus
